recipe:
{
  "title": "E2E MOCK Spicy Halloumi and Onion Curry",
  "prepTime": "10 minutes",
  "cookTime": "20 minutes",
  "totalTime": "30 minutes",
  "servings": "4",
  "description": "This spicy halloumi and onion curry is a delicious vegetarian dish inspired by Indian cuisine. The halloumi adds a unique twist to traditional curries, and the onions and garlic provide a flavorful base for the sauce.",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 tablespoon vegetable oil",
    "1 onion, sliced",
    "3 cloves garlic, minced",
    "1 teaspoon ground cumin",
    "1 teaspoon ground coriander",
    "1/2 teaspoon turmeric",
    "1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper",
    "1/2 teaspoon salt",
    "1 can diced tomatoes",
    "1/2 cup water",
    "1 block halloumi cheese, sliced",
    "1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro"
  ],
  "method": [
    "Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.",
    "Add the onion and garlic and saut√© for 5 minutes, or until the onion is soft.",
    "Add the cumin, coriander, turmeric, cayenne pepper, and salt and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.",
    "Add the diced tomatoes and water and bring to a simmer.",
    "Add the halloumi and simmer for 10 minutes, or until the cheese is heated through and the sauce has thickened.",
    "Stir in the cilantro and serve hot with rice or naan bread."
  ]
}
